Posts.Content: Hi went to hospital yesterday, and they did mammagram, then after a few mins they called me and said that they have to do close up mamagram cos they could see something, and not even in the breast i was complaining about. However after 10 mins called me in for ultrasound , then biopsy with ultrasound . Then the doctor called me in and said it is suspicios for cancer, i am absoluteley terrified, feel like taking tablets . What can i do wish he could have told me yesterday if its C or not. Has anybody here had a core biopsy, PLEASE PLEASE HELP ME X
Posts.Title: worried

Posts.Content: HI KTB It was a core biopsy that I had, they did mammogram, then asked me back in the room for a closer mammo, then ultrasound with core biopsy, do you think they no its cancer and are just grading it. When I said to doctor do you think I have cancer, he said its suspicious for cancer, why didnt he tell me straight out, cos they didnt do a needle aspiration but a core biopsy.Im at my wits end here with worry.x
Posts.Title: worried

Posts.Content: Hi the doc said I have to go on thursday morning for the results. I am so nervous as I lost my mum to lung cancer 6 months ago today, I nursed her to the end. Do you think hes not sure as the lump found by mammo is very small so he says.x
Posts.Title: worried

Posts.Content: Went to my doctor today as i was in a bit of a state. She said the worst case senario is that I have cancer, however when she examined me she could not feel a lump a few weeks ago, so she says it would be very early cancer and easily treatable which is good, she said if it was definately cancer and it had spread they would have detected the spread on mammo and ultrasound. So I will just have to wait till thursday, she also said that they probably did core biopsy and not needle aspiration as it is very small x
Posts.Title: worried

Posts.Content: Oh well todays come around, off in about an hour for the dreaded results, could not sleep. I am terrified of the news. x

Posts.Content: I did ask the doctor when he called me back to his room after core biopsy, I said is it cancer and he says its suspicious for cancer, what in his terms does he mean, why not tell me straight, rather than make me wait im a wreck.

Posts.Content: Hi Marly do you think the doc nos ive got it but just wants to be sure hes right , im worried sick now xxxxxxx

Posts.Content: Do they only do core biopsys if they suspect cancer.

Posts.Content: Went to doctors with lump under arm, and nipple discharge, she is sending me for an urgent mammagram, biopsy and ultrasound scan. Do you lose weight with breast cancer ?.
Posts.Title: worried

Posts.Content: Hi thanks for replying, he did not do fine needle aspiration, just a close up mammo after the 1st one, then ultrasound guided core biopsy. He said when I asked suspicious for cancer, but no percentage was talked about, he also said its very small and thought to be very early. Noting could be felt when he examined me, I also went complaining of nipple discharge [both sides] and problem with left side , so I was gobsmacked when told they had found something worrying in right breast. So maybe hes just suspicious and doesnt really no one way or another. Dont no what to think. xxx

Posts.Content: When the radiographer, was doing the ultrasound I could see a dark patch on the screen and she was measuring that. Oh roll on Thursday then I will no one way or another. This waiting is making me really ill. I already suffer from M.E. which makes me feel ill most of the time, so to add this to it would be horendous. x
